entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
